allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: millarX strategic partnership pitch deck

Single-page proposal showcasing capital-lite novated leasing platform.
Includes market analysis, three pillars strategy, financials, and partnership value proposition.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update ASX incumbents and expand exit strategies

- Remove SG Fleet \(no longer ASX-listed\)
- Add Smartgroup to ASX-listed incumbents
- Add ASX listing as a fourth exit pathway option

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add model comparison table showing competitive advantages

New "Why We Win" section with 14-dimension comparison:
- Incumbents vs millarX across revenue, costs, scaling, tech, risk
- Source attribution from MMS, FleetPartners, Smartgroup annual reports
- Key takeaway highlighting disruptive positioning

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add strategic content strengthening acquisition narrative

New sections added:
- The Incumbents'' Problem: 4-card grid showing pain points from their annual reports
- Operating Wedge: Visual comparing People→Systems flow vs System→Settlement flow
- Post-FBT Stress Test: Side-by-side comparison of millarX vs incumbent resilience
- What We''ve Already Proven: Checklist of validated achievements \(ACL, revenue, zero debt\)
- Why Buy, Not Build: Why incumbents can''t replicate internally + acquisition benefits
- Aggressive Close: Powerful closing quote in CTA section

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
